Module progettofinale.sailingclub
Package progettofinale.sailingclub.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
LoginController, MemberController, PaymentController, RegisterController, StaffController
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class represent the controller superclass where there are methods and functions used by the LoginController, MemberController, PaymentController, RegisterController, StaffController subclasses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • connection

      public Object connection(Request rq)
      This method is used to create a new connection to the server to send an object and then read the object that the server sends as a response with HOST = "localhost" and PORT = 4444.
      Parameters:
      rq - It is the object of type REQUEST that the method transfers to the server.
      Returns:
      the object received from the server response or NULL.

    • checkNotice

      public void checkNotice(String username)
      This method is used to make a request to the server and check if that member identified by his username appears in the database, so that he receives a notification (Alert) if any staff has sent it for lack of payment.
      Parameters:
      username - It is the member username.

    • handleHomeButton

      public void handleHomeButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is used to manage the login button in the Login.fxml file login scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • popUp

      public void popUp(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String text, String header)
      This method is used to make an alert (pop up) appear, different according to the needs, in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      alertType - It is the Alert object.
      text - It is the text that appears inside the alert.
      header - It is the header that appears inside the alert.

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fxml, String title) throws IOException
      This method is used to change the scene whenever it is needed by passing parameters.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that causes the scene change.
      fxml - It is the fxml file, basically it is the destination of the scene change.
      title - It is the title of the scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • printListFX

      public void printListFX(javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView, Object list)
      This method is used to print a list in the GUI by using the TableView class.
      Parameters:
      tableView - It is the name of the TableView in the appropriate fxml file.
      list - It is the list you want to print in the GUI.

    • viewBoats

      public Object viewBoats(javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView, String username)
      This method is used to display the list of boats of a particular member in the GUI, thanks to the printListFX method.
      Returns:
      the object received from the server response, if the request is successful it returns a list of boats.

    • addBoat

      public void addBoat(String owner, String boatName, String lengthBoat, javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView)
      This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.
      Parameters:
      owner - It is the owner of the boat you are adding.
      boatName - It is the name of the boat you are adding.
      lengthBoat - It is the length of the boat you are adding.
      tableView - It is the GUI table where the new boat is displayed.

    • rmvBoat

      public void rmvBoat(String owner, String idBoat, javafx.scene.control.TableView tableView)
      This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
      Parameters:
      owner - It is the owner of the boat being removed.
      idBoat - It is the identification code of the boat being removed.
      tableView - It is the GUI table.

    • viewRace

      public void viewRace(javafx.scene.control.TableView tableview)
      This method is used to make a request to the server to receive the list of races present in the server database and then display them in the GUI thanks to the printListFX method.
      Parameters:
      tableview - It is the GUI table.

    • viewMembershipFee

      protected Float viewMembershipFee()
      This method is used to make a request to the server to receive the membership fee that members must pay.
      Returns:
      the Float object that represents the membership fee.
